translated: The Piccolomini Library is the library of Cardinal Piccolomini (later Pope) included in the Duomo of Siena and is best known for its huge Pinturicchio's frescoes.
original: La Libreria Piccolomini est la biblioth√®que du cardinal Piccolomini (futur pape) incluse dans le Duomo de Sienne et qui est surtout connu pour ses immenses fresques du Pinturicchio.
